content.raw:
this will change our work layout, probably for better. So instead of having a separate directory we can work directly on src/frc_red_team.

The only problem I saw was to modify the repo and run wstool update again. But I tried it and it respects the changes.
content.html:
this will change our work layout, probably for better. So instead of having a separate directory we can work directly on src/frc_red_team.

The only problem I saw was to modify the repo and run wstool update again. But I tried it and it respects the changes.
